textos_fuente.text: Contact Chula Vista Wisconsin Dells - Chula Vista Meetings & Events INSERT PROMO HEADLINE HERE Insert Promo Headline Here 866-382-4852 CHULA VISTA RESORT 866-382-4852 Home Events Event Services Meetings & Conferences Social Events Hybrid Events Event Catering Event Rentals Facilities Event Spaces Floor Plans Fact Sheet Technology Policies & Guidelines Facilities FAQs Accommodations Onsite Amenities Waterparks Cold Water Canyon Golf Course Dells Zipline Adventures Outdoor Attractions Other Amenities Dining About Resort Map Our Team COVID19 Response Media Press Mentions Photo Gallery Video Gallery Contact SUBMIT RFP SUBMIT RFP Home Events Event Services Meetings & Conferences Social Events Hybrid Events Event Catering Event Rentals Facilities Event Spaces Floor Plans Fact Sheet Technology Policies & Guidelines Facilities FAQs Accommodations Onsite Amenities Waterparks Cold Water Canyon Golf Course Dells Zipline Adventures Outdoor Attractions Other Amenities Dining About Resort Map Our Team COVID19 Response Media Press Mentions Photo Gallery Video Gallery Contact SUBMIT RFP SUBMIT RFP Connect With The Chula Vista Resort Team Get In Touch Need help planning your next getaway to Chula Vista Resort? Contact us today with your questions. Give us a call at one of the numbers listed here, or send us a message using our form provided on this page. Resort Address 1000 Chula Vista Parkway Wisconsin Dells, Wisconsin 53965 ▸ Phone Number & Email Phone Number 866-382-4852 Email Address meetings@chulavistaresort.com ▸ Directions To Chula Vista Resort GPS Address: Chula Vista Resort 2501 River Road Wisconsin Dells, WI 53965 Alternate GPS Address: Chula Vista Resort 1000 Chula Vista Parkway Wisconsin Dells, WI 53965 Physical Mailing Address: Chula Vista Resort 2501 River Road Wisconsin Dells, WI 53965 From Madison/Milwaukee/Chicago: Take I90/94 West past Madison to exit 87 for the Wisconsin Dells Hwy 13. There is only one way to go off the exit; go through to the seventh stoplight and you’ll reach Hwy 13 North. Turn left on Hwy 13 North and travel 2.8 miles. Turn left on Chula Vista Parkway. From Madison West side: Follow Hwy 12 West through Sauk City and Baraboo to the Wisconsin Dells. When you enter Wisconsin Dells take I90/94 West. Go west 5 miles to exit 87 for the Wisconsin Dells Hwy 13. After exiting, go to the seventh stoplight to Hwy 13 North. Turn left on Hwy 13 North and travel 2.8 miles. Turn left onto Chula Vista Parkway. From Minneapolis/Eau Claire: Take I90/94 East to exit 87 for the Wisconsin Dells Hwy 13. Once off the exit follow through to the seventh stop light and turn left on Hwy 13 North and travel 2.8 miles. Turn left onto Chula Vista Parkway. From Wausau: Follow I39 South to exit 100 for Hwy 23. Follow Hwy 23 past Briggsville for about fifteen miles. Once you reach the intersections of Hwy’s 16,23, and 13, take a right and go north on Hwy 13 for 2.8 miles. Turn left into the Chula Vista Parkway entrance. From Eau Claire: (via Hwy 12): Follow Hwy 12 East through to the Wisconsin Dells. At the first stoplight take a left onto Hwy 13 North. Follow Hwy 13 through to the fifth stoplight and turn left on Hwy 13 North and travel 2.8 miles. Turn left onto Chula Vista Parkway. From Portage: (Hwy 16): Follow Hwy 16 North to the Wisconsin Dells. Once you reach the intersections of Hwy’s 16,23, and 13, continue straight (north on Hwy 13) for 2.8 miles. Turn left onto Chula Vista Parkway. Get Directions via Google Maps here . ▸ Social Media Links Facebook Twitter Instagram YouTube Pinterest Google Plus First Name * Last Name * Email * Your Message * Submit Connect With The Chula Vista Resort Team Get In Touch Need help planning your next getaway to Chula Vista Resort? Chula Vista Golf Course Home Venues Arizona Phoenix Apache Wells Country Club California Burbank / Los Angeles DeBell Golf Course East Bay Blue Rock Springs Golf Club Lake Chabot Golf Course Fairfield Bella Verdi At Rancho Solano Top Knot At Paradise Valley Inland Empire Dos Lagos Golf Course San Diego Chula Vista Golf Course Riverwalk Golf Club San Francisco Presidio Golf Course San Jose Coyote Creek Golf Club Michaels Restaurant & Events Santa Barbara Glen Annie Golf Club Sonoma County Bennett Valley Golf Course Stockton The Reserve At Spanos Park Colorado Denver The Vista At Applewood Golf Course Louisiana New Orleans Stonebridge Golf Club New Mexico Clovis Point Colonial Park Golf Course Texas Austin Grey Rock Golf Club Lady Bird Johnson Dallas Country View Golf Course El Paso Painted Dunes Houston Battleground Golf Course Laredo Casa Blanca Golf Club Weatherford Canyon West Golf Club Regions Weddings Packages Planning & Advice News Contact Request Info Home >> Venues San Diego Wedding at Chula Vista Golf Course Located near Mt. Miguel and the Sweetwater Reservoir, and just 20 minutes south of San Diego, Chula Vista Golf Course is a breathtaking spot for your wedding. At Chula Vista Golf Course, we specialize in creating one-of-a-kind weddings and special events of all sizes and types. We make sure that it will reflect your personal style and create memories that will last a lifetime. From intimate weddings and banquets, to large outdoor receptions, we do it all. The club’s distinguished atmosphere has breathtaking views for your perfect day. Chula Vista outdoor ceremonies are taken to a whole new level because we can host up to 200 guests. Indoor accommodations are available for ceremonies of up to 150 guests; with the scenic backdrop of the course providing an abundance of photo opportunities. Chula Vista Golf Course also offers a range of packages to suit your style and budget; and our experienced on-site events team will ensure that every detail of your special day is handled flawlessly. Venue Details Total Square Footage 4,000 Free AV Yes Ballroom Ceiling Height 10 Rent the Entire Space Yes Maximum Indoor Capacity 200 Outside Tented Capacity 500 Pre-Function Space No Valet Parking No Free Parking Yes All-Inclusive Packages Yes Outdoor Reception Space Yes Venue Highlights Newly renovated Free and well-lit parking View of the San Miguel Mountains 4475 Bonita Road, Bonita, CA 91902 (619) 479-4141 ext. 255 Contact Venue Price This Venue Wedding Venue Packages Click here to view our available Wedding Packages and start the planning process today! We offer fully customizable options – please be sure to contact your local Events Coordinator for further details. View Packages Wedding Planning Guide Make sure your wedding day is exceptional with our FREE Wedding Planning Guide. Get detailed checklists, expert tips, and more ($12.00 value)! Download Guide Meet Our team Rebecca Del Toro Director of Sales Book an Appointment (619) 479-4141 ext. 225 Send Email I started my career at the Chula Vista Golf Course as a Private Events Sales Director in November of 2014. My passion for planning events started when I was planning my sister’s wedding, from then on I continued to plan events and bake cakes for friends and family members! I have developed a strong passion for the industry and love meeting new couples and finding out how we can make their wedding day memorable! I was born and raised in San Diego, California I enjoy being outdoors as much as possible. When I am not at work, I am out hiking, running or riding my bike! Fun Facts My favorite musical artist or music type: Prince My favorite quote or famous saying: Be kind to others. My favorite city in the world: Madrid, Spain Number of years in the wedding industry: Three I am originally from: San Diego, California Favorite movie of all time: The Rocky movies My favorite hobby when I am not working: Refurbish furniture and bake If I could have dinner with one famous person living or dead it would be: Daniel Day Lewis No. 1 thing on my bucket list is: To hike the Pacific the Pacific Crest Trail. If I had a gift card with an unlimited balance I would shop at: Nordstrom My favorite part of the wedding planning process is: Helping plan the most important day of a couple's life. Best advice I can give a bride: Always be kind and respect each other. Event Spaces & Ceremony Sites Vista Room The scenic backdrop of the course affords an abundance of photo opportunities to capture the romance of your special day. With the capacity to host 200 guests, the Vista Room is a warm and inviting place to host yourt Bonita Wedding or Ceremony. This spacious interior featuring airy high ceilings is decorated in a neutral palette, making the room easily customized to suit your tastes. Links Room The Links Room is suited for smaller-scale gatherings of up to 80. This distinctive location looks out through a bank of windows offering pleasing views of the rolling, hilly greens. Accented with rich mahogany, it has a contemporary feel that is comfortable and appealing but without an air of stuffiness. This room is the perfeect location for any Chula Vista Wedding Event. Ceremony Site Our Ceremony Site is the bets place to get married in Bonita California. Our incredible outdoor space overlooks a beautifully manicured golf course and incredible views making it the perfect wedding location in San Diego. Weddings Reviews This place was beautiful. The staff was AMAZING. The food was the talk of the evening! Rebecca Del Torro was awesome, she helped us plan our special day from beginning to end and was very attentive. She listened to what we wanted for our day and helped to ensure that it was exactly what we had envisioned and then some! I would definitely recommend this location. I would also like to say that the event staff mainly Erica was there as well from the beginning of the event to the very end making sure that everything went smoothly. Their prices were great and the entire staff was professional and prepared for every tiny detail. N. De Los Santos The ceremony site was out on the golf course and made for beautiful pictures! We loved our wedding and everything turned out GREAT! All our guests complimented us on how beautiful everything was. We were very excited to have found the venue, and even more delighted to have found Rebecca as the event manager. From the first conversation with Rebecca, she was genuinely interested in helping us achieve our vision and create an unforgettable day. P. Murray My husband and I got married at Chula Vista and it was purely amazing. All of our guests had nothing but great things to say about our wedding. They were so amazed at how organized everything was from the ceremony to the reception. The ceremony outside in the golf course was just a sight to see. J. Meninges Last night we held our son's wedding reception at the Chula Vista Golf Course. They did a fantastic job from beginning to end. Working with Rebecca, Ryan, Erica and the rest of the staff was a great experience. The servers were attentive, the food was good, and everyone seemed to enjoy themselves. J. Yumen First of all, I want to thank Rebecca for her incredible amount of dedication to her work. She has such a talent for coordinating events like weddings, and I cannot thank her enough. The venue itself is beautiful, the room had a great view of the course with beautiful large windows which is draped with white curtains. For the price, location, and size of venue alone, it is highly recommended and will definitely be using this venue again in the future. K. Chula Vista Golf Course Tournament Venues Arizona Chandler San Marcos Golf Course Fort Mohave Huukan Golf Club Phoenix Apache Wells Country Club California Azusa Azusa Greens Golf Course Burbank/North Los Angeles Arcadia Golf Course DeBell Golf Course Carlsbad Rancho Carlsbad Golf Club Carson Victoria Golf Course Inland Empire Dos Lagos Golf Course Fairfield Rancho Solano Paradise Valley Palm Desert Shadow Mountain Golf Course San Diego Chula Vista Golf Course Riverwalk Golf Club San Jose Coyote Creek Golf Club Shoreline Golf Links Santa Barbara Glen Annie Golf Club Santa Carla Pruneridge Golf Club San Francisco Bay Area Blue Rock Springs Golf Club Franklin Canyon Golf Course Lake Chabot Golf Course Presidio Golf Course Redwood Canyon Golf Course Tilden Park Golf Course Mill Valley Golf Course Sonoma County Bennett Valley Golf Course Stockton Reserve at Spanos Park Needles Rivers Edge Golf Course Colorado Denver/Metro Applewood Golf Course Louisiana Gretna Stonebridge Golf Club New Mexico Clovis Colonial Park Golf Course Nevada Laughlin Mojave Resort Golf Club Texas Austin Grey Rock Golf Club Brownsville Valley International Country Club Dallas/Fort Worth Country View Golf Course El Paso Painted Dunes Desert Golf Course Fredericksburg Lady Bird Johnson Municipal Golf Course Houston Battleground Golf Course Laredo Casa Blanca Golf Course Weatherford Canyon West Golf Course Our Regions Packages Planning & Advice Contact Home >> Back To Regions >> Chula Vista Golf Course | Bonita CA Chula Vista Golf Course | Bonita CA Located near Mt. Miguel and the Sweetwater Reservoir in the foothills of the San Miguel Mountains and just 20 minutes south of San Diego, Chula Vista Golf Course is a breathtaking spot for golf and special events. As one of the area’s best values for golf and a community centerpiece, this 6,760-yard championship course, designed by Billy Casper, follows the Sweetwater River and is surrounded by popular jogging trails and equestrian paths. From its challenging layout, complete with local flocks of ducks and geese, to the elegantly-adorned banquet facility and first-rate service, Chula Vista Golf Course—voted “Best Golf Course” in 2011 by the Star News Reader—is an beautiful setting for a round of enjoyable golf, or an outstanding tournament, wedding, or special event. Course Details Total Course Yardage: 6,759 Holes: 18 Tournaments 7 Days A Week: Yes Tournament Scoring Included: Yes Food and Beverage: Yes Bunkers: 37 Shuttle Carts: No Rental Clubs: Yes Driving Range: Yes Banquet Space: Yes Custom Scorecards Available: Yes Day of Facilitator: No Course Highlights 2 Large Banquet Rooms Full Service Restaurant & Bar Driving Range & Practice Facility 4475 Bonita Road, Bonita, CA 91902 (619) 479-4141 ext. 225 Contact The Course Now Please complete all required fields! First Name (*) Please let us know your name. Last Name (*) Invalid Input Email Address (*) Please let us know your email address. My passion for planning events started when I was planning my sister’s wedding, from then on I continued to plan events and bake cakes for friends and family members! I have developed a strong passion for the industry and love meeting new couples and finding out how we can make their wedding day memorable! I was born and raised in San Diego, California I enjoy being outdoors as much as possible. When I am not at work, I am out hiking, running or riding my bike! Fun Facts My favorite musical artist or music type: Prince My favorite quote or famous saying: Be kind to others. My favorite city in the world: Madrid, Spain Number of years in the wedding industry: Three I am originally from: San Diego, California Favorite movie of all time: The Rocky movies My favorite hobby when I am not working: Refurbish furniture and bake If I could have dinner with one famous person living or dead it would be: Daniel Day Lewis No. 1 thing on my bucket list is: To hike the Pacific the Pacific Crest Trail. If I had a gift card with an unlimited balance I would shop at: Nordstrom My favorite part of the wedding planning process is: Helping plan the most important day of a couple's life. Best advice I can give a bride: Always be kind and respect each other. Event Space Descriptions Driving Range The Driving Range located next to the golf shop and contains over 20 practice stalls to dial in your game. In addition to the Driving Range, we have a chipping green and putting green to round out the practice area. Tournament Pavilion or Awards Banquet We have 2 spacious and newly renovated rooms for your tournament to choose from. Either is perfect place to end your day on the course. Cart Staging Area The cart staging area is conveniently located next to the Driving Range & Golf Shop that is shaded by large palm trees in a parklike setting. Your golfers will feel like a VIP as they start their round. Clubhouse Chula Vista Golf Course has a golf shop stocked with accessories, equipment, shoes and apparel for all golf needs. After the round, you can join us in the 19th Hole for appetizers, lunch entrees, or drinks in our full service restaurant and lounge area. Tournament Reviews We had our wedding ceremony and cocktail reception at the Chula Vista Golf Course and we couldn’t of been happier with the experience. Chris, Rebecca, Justin and the catering staff were fantastic! We had originally planned to have an outdoor ceremony but because of rain, we had to move it inside. The staff rearranged the ballroom for our ceremony and it turned out great. We opted for a cocktail reception rather than a sit down dinner and we are so happy we chose that route. Chris and Justin worked with us in advance to create the menu which even included churro donuts, cookies and milk towards the end of the night. The food was amazing and we received so many compliments about it. We highly recommend this location for your event. D. Schreck For a public course this place was all class. Found somebody's wedge and got it to them, lost our putter cover and got it back, was on stand-by as a threesome and teed off within 5 minutes, son received free golf balls from one of the marshals, just a perfect day. Everyone fixed their ball marks so the greens are true. Lots of fun. F. Ferguson Enjoyed the driving range and the atmosphere of the club house... staff was friendly and helpful and the other patrons were extremely kind... great place to visit during my vacation. There’s something for every level of golfer, whether you’re looking to improve your short game, enjoy a casual round with friends, or test your skills in competitive play, The Villages offers endless opportunities! A Golfer's Paradise Golf is always in season here, with stunning courses that are as beautiful as they are diverse. Learn about our guidelines, etiquette and fees, plus get daily golf course maintenance updates below. Learn More About Your Community quick links eNews What's Happening Utility Bill Guest IDs Find My District Resident Academy Public Records Request Contact Us 24/7 Our Mission Find My District District Maps Careers FAQs ADA Info Contact Us Public Records Custodian Florida has a very broad Public Records Law. Most written communications to or from State and Local Officials regarding State or Local business are public records available to the public and media upon request. To submit a digital request please click below: Public Records Request Or, please forward requests to: Jennifer Farlow, District Clerk 3571 Kiessel Road, The Villages, FL 32163 Jennifer.Farlow@DistrictGov.org Phone No. (352) 751-3939 | Fax No. (352) 753-6430 Please Note Florida law prohibits the Board of Supervisors from communicating with residents about Deed Compliance or Architectural Review issues/cases. To report any concerns, please submit a digital request or contact the Community Standards Department directly at: DeedCompliance@DistrictGov.org Under Florida law, e-mail addresses are public records. If you do not want your e-mail address released in response to a public records request, do not send electronic mail to this entity. Instead, contact this office by phone or in writing.
